features: Power Over Ethernet Quick Remote Access 720P HD Real-Time
recordingmode: Manual / Time Scheduled / Alarm Triggered / Motion Detect
networkprotocol: TCP/IP, UDP, DNS/ DDNS, SMTP, UPNP, DHCP, HTTP, P2P
networkconnection: 1 RJ45 10M/ 100M self-adaption & 4 independent 10/ 100 Mbps ethernet interfaces
